sentences.en: Children in small classes are several months ahead in reading.
sentences.cn: 小班的孩子们提前几个月就开始阅读。

sentences.en: Did you have a lot of reading during the vacation?
sentences.cn: 放假期间你读了很多书吗？

sentences.en: He is now reading for a maths degree at Surrey University.
sentences.cn: 他现在就读于萨里大学，攻读数学学位。

sentences.en: He misplaces his reading glasses with such regularity that aides carry extras.
sentences.cn: 他老是记不起把自己阅读时用的放大镜放在什么地方，所以助手们会随身携带备用的。

sentences.en: He was sitting on an upright chair beside his bed, reading.
sentences.cn: 他正坐在床前一张直背椅上看书。

sentences.en: He's obliged to take his turn at reading out the announcements.
sentences.cn: 轮到他大声宣读通知了。

sentences.en: His remedial teacher sees signs of progress in his reading and writing.
sentences.cn: 他的辅导教师发现了他在阅读和写作方面进步的迹象。

sentences.en: I was catching up on a bit of reading.
sentences.cn: 当时我在忙着读些东西。

sentences.en: I'm sick of reading headlines involving the Kennedys in sex scandals.
sentences.cn: 关于肯尼迪家族性丑闻的新闻标题都让我读得腻烦了。

sentences.en: Language interpretation is the whole point of the act of reading.
sentences.cn: 阅读行为中关键在于对语言的理解。

sentences.en: Patty began reading everything she could get her hands on.
sentences.cn: 帕蒂开始阅读她能找到的所有东西。

sentences.en: Reading is taught using a combination of several methods.
sentences.cn: 综合运用多种方法进行阅读教学。

sentences.en: Sometimes the home environment just isn't conducive to reading.
sentences.cn: 有时候，家里的环境确实不适合看书。

sentences.en: Thatched pavilions provide shady retreats for relaxing and reading in privacy.
sentences.cn: 茅草亭是独自放松和读书的阴凉清幽之所。

sentences.en: The book is quite difficult on first reading.
sentences.cn: 这本书第一次阅读时很难懂。

sentences.en: The list of drinks, a dozen pages long, makes fascinating reading.
sentences.cn: 酒水单一共有十几页长，读起来很有趣。

sentences.en: They will concentrate on teaching the basics of reading, writing and arithmetic.
sentences.cn: 他们将集中教授阅读、写作和算术基础知识。

words.tran_cn: 可读的；易读的；读起来津津有味的
读者人数；读者们；读者的身分

phrases.tran_cn: 计数读数；仪表读数，计数器读数

trans.tran_en: the activity or skill of understanding written words

trans.tran_cn: 读( read的现在分词)，看懂，理解，显示，标明
